long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension shows frequency of words on the webpage

It stores previous user input with result. So, when the user opens it again, it displays the previous user input and result to help the study.

I made it for the purpose of helping my English study.
